cause.description:
after two seasons at liverpool it looks like the stress of managing a rubbish team like liverpool has final taken its toll, and hes going bald. lets get some cash together to buy him some dignity cause he aint gonna get it from liverpool
1. hair for rafa
2. dignity back to scousers
3. liverpool down to div 1
cause.mission: get some hair on that hispanic head
cause.name: get rafal benitez a hair piece
